text: Paper Boats () is an Argentine Spanish drama movie directed by Román Viñoly Barreto and was based on the novel Barcos el papel by Álvaro Yunque. It stars Pablo Calvo, Jardel Filho, Ubaldo Martínez, Enzo Viena, Mariángeles, Alita Román, Ariel Absalón, Alberto Olmedo, Oscar Orlegui, Nelly Láinez. == Other websites == * Category:1963 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Román Viñoly Barreto
title: Paper Boats
